resources.string: Have more time to do what you like and get more productive
Get the best response with the help of your friends
Join together to the same room and vote for the best answer, the app will sum the votes and show the best, no more confusions with conflicting opinions
The more people the best, every room can have up to 10000 people
Be descret, get the answers via vibrations
Use your phone volume keys to choose the question and the phone will vibrate based on the most voted answers
I am not responsible for the use you make of this app, I\'m warning you, taking risks is OK but be them calculated ones.
Hey, take a look at StudyLess, we can use it.

With Studyless I wanted to develop an old idea of communicating through morse code using vibrations, this is a quite more expanded version of that. It is a non-intrusive way of comunicating, you may use it the way you like

To use it you first have to join a room, at start time you are assigned a random room but you can change it in the button of the question list. Once in a room you will see all of them in neutral state, now all your friends can join (the more the better) and begin choosing answers. \n The most voted will appear in place of "Not sure"

If you want to go to the next level, you can use the phone vibration to retrieve the answers. To do so, you need the device unlocked and the app open (It is recommenced to deactivate the look screen and leave the app open) then you are going to use the volume down key to select the question, each press counts in a sum, so if you are interested in the 4th question you have to press the volume down key 4 times, for the 5th five times and so onâ€¦ After one second without key presses the device will vibrate gibing you the most voted answer in the following way:
1 short vibration = A
2 short vibrations = B
3 short vibrations = C
4 short vibrations = D
And 1 long vibration means that there is no clear answer

**
To get a better experience you should desactivate the lock screen to be able to use the vibrations functionality without looking at the screen as the vibrations doesn\'t work when the phone is locked
